subject: Soccer
Olympic Games
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Jermain Defoe pounced on a defensive blunder to score in an open net in the 80th minute and give struggling Sunderland a 1-0 win.
snippet: Jermain Defoe pounced on a defensive blunder to score in an open net in the 80th minute and give struggling Sunderland a 1-0 win.
